intro: Notopleura terepaimensis, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant typically has a short, stocky stem with broad, velvety leaves that are often dark green in color. Notopleura terepaimensis thrives in humid, well-drained soil and requires indirect sunlight for optimal growth. It is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
